mapper.select: SELECT b_invoice.`b_invoice_id`, b_invoice.`b_invoice_type`, b_invoice.`b_invoice_name`, b_invoice.`b_invoice_company`, b_invoice.`b_invoice_num`, b_invoice.`b_invoice_status`, b_invoice.`b_member_id`, b_invoice.`b_invoice_bank`, b_invoice.`b_invoice_bank_num`, b_invoice.`b_invoice_tel`, DATE_FORMAT(b_invoice.`b_invoice_ctime`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `b_invoice_ctime`, DATE_FORMAT(b_invoice.`b_invoice_mtime`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `b_invoice_mtime`, b_invoice.`xt_provinceID`, b_invoice.`xt_cityID`, b_invoice.`xt_districtID`, b_invoice.`b_invoice_address`, xt_province.`NAME` AS xt_provinceName, xt_city.`NAME` AS xt_cityName, xt_district.`NAME` AS xt_districtName FROM b_invoice b_invoice LEFT JOIN xt_area_region xt_province ON b_invoice.xt_provinceID = xt_province.ID LEFT JOIN xt_area_region xt_city ON xt_city.ID = b_invoice.xt_cityID LEFT JOIN xt_area_region xt_district ON xt_district.ID = b_invoice.xt_districtID WHERE 1=1 AND b_invoice.b_member_id=#{b_member_id}
